input.command:
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/translate -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"text":"hello","sourceLang":"auto","targetLang":"es"}' --max-time 15 &
CURL_PID=$!
sleep 12
kill $CURL_PID 2>/dev/null
echo "Request completed or timed out"
tail -10 dev.log
input.description: Test translation with timeout and check logs
